mapper.select: select S.*, SC.CORE_RETURN_CODE, SC.CORE_SN, SC.CORE_RETURN_MSG, SC.OPER_TYPE businessType FROM( SELECT T.ID, T.CUST_ID, T.WORK_DATE, T.SETTLE_BEGIN_DATE, T.SETTLE_END_DATE, T.PROTOCOL_ID, T.RECEIVE_COUNT, T.RECEIVE_TOTAL_AMT, T.RECEIVE_TOTAL_FEE, T.REVOKE_COUNT, T.REVOKE_TOTAL_AMT, T.REVOKE_TOTAL_FEE, T.REFUND_COUNT, T.REFUND_TOTAL_AMT, T.REFUND_TOTAL_FEE, T.WITHDRAW_COUNT, T.WITHDRAW_TOTAL_AMT, T.WITHDRAW_TOTAL_FEE, T.MERCHANT_RECEIVABLE, T.MERCHANT_PAYABLE, T.SETTLE_AMT, T.FINISH_DATE, T.STATUS SETTLE_STATUS, T.MEMO, T.INST_USER, T.INST_DATE, T.INST_DATETIME, T.AUDIT_USER, T.AUDIT_DATETIME, T.VERIFIED_USER, T.VERIFIED_DATETIME, T.APPLY_CORE_ID, T.SETTLE_CORE_ID, A1.COLUMN_VALUE BANK_CARD_NO, A3.COLUMN_VALUE BANK_CARD_NAME, A2.COLUMN_VALUE MERCHANT_NAME, A4.COLUMN_VALUE BANK_NAME FROM BMS_MERCHANT_SETTLE t LEFT JOIN BMS_PROTOCOL_COLUMN A1 ON A1.PROTOCOL_ID = T.PROTOCOL_ID AND A1.STATUS = 'VALID' AND A1.COLUMN_CODE = 'bankCardNo' LEFT JOIN BMS_PROTOCOL_COLUMN A2 ON A2.PROTOCOL_ID = T.PROTOCOL_ID AND A2.STATUS = 'VALID' AND A2.COLUMN_CODE = 'merchantName' LEFT JOIN BMS_PROTOCOL_COLUMN A3 ON A3.PROTOCOL_ID = T.PROTOCOL_ID AND A3.STATUS = 'VALID' AND A3.COLUMN_CODE = 'bankCardName' LEFT JOIN BMS_PROTOCOL_COLUMN A4 ON A4.PROTOCOL_ID = T.PROTOCOL_ID AND A4.STATUS = 'VALID' AND A4.COLUMN_CODE = 'bankName') S, BMS_MERCHANT_CHILD_SETTLE SC WHERE S.ID = SC.SETTLE_ID AND SC.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE BMS_MERCHANT_SETTLE S SET S. STATUS = #{statusStr,jdbcType = VARCHAR} WHERE S.ID = (SELECT C.SETTLE_ID FROM BMS_MERCHANT_CHILD_SETTLE C WHERE C.ORDER_ID = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR})
